reviewText: The only reason I gave it this rating, and we love the movie, is because we accidentally got the version international version where you have to put a code on the blu ray.  Now that made us mad.  We were looking forward to seeing it remastered.  Now we have to see if we can get it decoded or something to that effect.

Before purchasing the remastered version make sure your blue ray player supports region B or this disk will not work!!!!.  You can get the regular Baraka blue ray version. Its the same as the remastered.
